versos: (short) "And being warned in a dream not to return to Herod, they departed to their own country by another way." - Matthew 2:12;;;
(former) Isaiah 43:18 - "Forget the former things; do not dwell on the past.";;;
(greatest) "But he that is greatest among you shall be your servant." - Matthew 23:11 KJV;;;
(cutting) Genesis 17:10 - This is my covenant with you and your descendants after you
(blotted) Isaiah 43:25: "I, even I, am he who blots out your transgressions, for my own sake, and remembers your sins no more.";;;

(bring) He restores my soul; He leads me in the paths of righteousness For His names sake.
- Psalm 23:3;;;
(request) "Ask and it will be given to you; seek and you will find; knock and the door will be opened to you." - Matthew 7:7;;;
(measure) Ezekiel 45:10 - "You are to have honest scales, honest weights, an honest ephah, and an honest hin. I am the Lord your God, who brought you out of the land of Egypt.";;;
(male) Genesis 1:27 - "So God created mankind in his own image, in the image of God he created them; male and female he created them.";;;
(evil) Proverbs 8:13 - "The fear of the LORD is to hate evil: pride, and arrogancy, and the evil way, and the froward mouth, do I hate.";;;
(spoken) Genesis 12:3 - "I will bless those who bless you, and whoever curses you I will curse; and all peoples on earth will be blessed through you.";;;
(died) Romans 5:8 - "But God demonstrates his own love for us in this: While we were still sinners, Christ died for us.";;;
(buried) Matthew 27:60 - and laid it in his own new tomb
(reproof) Proverbs 15:31 - "The ear that listens to life-giving reproof will dwell among the wise.";;;

(moses) Deuteronomy 34:9 - "Now Joshua son of Nun was filled with the spirit of wisdom because moses had laid his hands on him. So the Israelites listened to him and did what the Lord had commanded moses.";;;
(taketh) Matthew 21:43 - "Therefore say I unto you, The kingdom of God shall be taken from you, and given to a nation bringing forth the fruits thereof.";;;
(hold) 1 Thessalonians 5:21 - "but test them all; hold on to what is good,";;;
